text: Hey there, How to create connections between HubSpot and ThirdParty applications? Am newbie for HubSpot Development, already released more than 15 applications for Zoho. In HubSpot created the cards , how to maintain the authorisation connections? Any inputs?

Welcome to developers Kavitha! Basically there are two main methods to integrate apps to HubSpot:
1. Direct connection between HubSpot and other app with API key or OAuth. More <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/overview|here> and in <https://legacydocs.HubSpot.com/docs/overview|legacy docs>. This might need a middleware if the other app canâ€™t make request to HubSpot API directly.
2. The easier way is to use <http://zapier.com|Zapier> or  <http://piesync.com|Piesync> if both apps are listed there. 

If you want :rocket: start to building own app, you could use this Github repo as a base of your own project: <https://github.com/HubSpot/HubSpot-api-nodejs|https://github.com/HubSpot/HubSpot-api-nodejs>
Thanks for your swift response. Will check and get back to you for further queries.
How to become a Authorised App Partner for HubSpot?
Hey Kavitha, this page here should help guide you on becoming an app partner <https://www.HubSpot.com/partners/app|https://www.HubSpot.com/partners/app>
